page.title: 16POLITICS
page.content: Lapford lies in Mid Devon and comes under the control of {Mid Devon {Council.}The Council is composed of members from the major political parties.Within the village is the{ {Parish Council.}The Council is composed of a group of people who work in the intrest of the whole village.A small part of the rates goes towards the parish council to be used within the village.The parish councillors are elected by anyone over eighteen years old.At present there is a chairman and nine other councillors.There are no standing pressure groups in the village but if an issue arrises within the parish council there are also the{ {Governors}of the school.The Governors make sure things go on properly at the school.There is also the school{P.T.A. {
